name: Ruined: A weird Metroidvania
description:
A volume of about 24 or more is recommended. Also, depending on your PC, the game may not run too well in the browser, if you run into issues, please download the windows/linux version.

The game is playable with a controller, except when you need a mouse, just grab one then.
